Копируем на FTP скриптом bash

January 18, 2019

Reading time ~1 minute

FTP COPY Bash SCRIPT:


#!/bin/sh

SERVER=192.168.0.1
USER=sergey-novikov
SOURCE_DIRS="/bin /boot /dev /etc /home /lib64 /opt /root /sbin /usr /var"
BACKUP_DIR=Backups

ftp -n $SERVER << EOS
user $USER
verbose
prompt
cd $BACKUP_DIR
mdelete *.tar.gz
binary
put "| tar cvzf - $SOURCE_DIRS" `date +%y%m%d`.tar.gz
quit
EOS
linuxmain Updated on January 18, 2019 Sergey Khatsiola
